AbapdocConf.description:
Various checks regarding abapdoc. Base rule checks for existence of abapdoc for
public class methods and all interface methods.

checkLocal.description: Check local classes and interfaces for abapdoc.

ConstructorVisibilityPublicConf.description:
Constructor must be placed in the public section, even if the class is not CREATE PUBLIC.

https://help.sap.com/doc/abapdocu_751_index_htm/7.51/en-US/abeninstance_constructor_guidl.htm

https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/07/

dependencies.description: External git dependencies used for syntax checks

7bit_ascii.description:
Only allow characters from the 7bit ASCII set.
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/05/

abapdoc.description:
Various checks regarding abapdoc. Base rule checks for existence of abapdoc for
public class methods and all interface methods.

allowed_object_naming.description: Enforces basic name length and namespace restrictions

allowed_object_types.description: Restricts the set of allowed object types.

ambiguous_statement.description: Checks for ambiguity between deleting from internal and database table

begin_end_names.description: Check BEGIN OF and END OF names match

check_abstract.description:
Checks abstract methods and classes:
- class defined as abstract and final,
- non-abstract class contains abstract methods

check_ddic.description: Checks the types of DDIC objects can be resolved, the namespace of the development/errors can be configured in "errorNamespace"

check_no_handler_pragma.description: Checks NO_HANDLER pragmas that can be removed

check_syntax.description: Enables syntax check and variable resolution

check_transformation_exists.description: Checks that used XSLT transformations exist.

class_attribute_names.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for class variable names.

cloud_types.description: Checks that the package does not contain any object types unsupported in cloud ABAP.

colon_missing_space.description: Checks for missing spaces after colons in chained statements.

commented_code.description:
Detects usage of commented out code.
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#delete-code-instead-of-commenting-it
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/14/

constructor_visibility_public.description:
Constructor must be placed in the public section, even if the class is not CREATE PUBLIC.
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#if-your-global-class-is-create-private-leave-the-constructor-public
https://help.sap.com/doc/abapdocu_751_index_htm/7.51/en-US/abeninstance_constructor_guidl.htm

contains_tab.description:
Checks for usage of tabs (enable to enforce spaces)
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/09/

definitions_top.description:
Checks that definitions are placed at the beginning of methods.
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/17/

description_empty.description: Ensures descriptions in class metadata exist.

double_space.description: Checks that only a single space follows certain common statements.

empty_line_in_statement.description:
Checks that statements do not contain empty lines.
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/41/

empty_statement.description: Checks for empty statements (an empty statement is a single dot)

empty_structure.description: Checks that the code does not contain empty blocks.

exit_or_check.description: Detects usages of EXIT or CHECK statements outside of loops.

exporting.description:
Detects EXPORTING statements which can be omitted.
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#omit-the-optional-keyword-exporting
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/30/

form_no_dash.description: Checks for a Dash in form names.

form_tables_obsolete.description: Checks for TABLES parameters in forms.

fully_type_constants.description: Checks constants for full typing - no implicit typing allowed.

functional_writing.description:
Detects usage of call method when functional style calls can be used.
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#prefer-functional-to-procedural-calls
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/07/

global_class.description: Checks related to names of global classes. For the name pattern, see rule object_naming

if_in_if.description: Detects nested ifs which can be refactored to a single condition using AND.

implement_methods.description: Chekcs for abstract methods which need implementing.

in_statement_indentation.description:
Checks alignment within block statement declarations which span multiple lines, such as multiple conditions in IF statements.
Example:
IF 1 = 1 AND
  2 = 2.

inline_data_old_versions.description: Checks for inline data declarations in older releases.

keep_single_parameter_on_one_line.description: Keep single parameter calls on one line

keyword_case.description: Checks that keywords have the same case. Non-keywords must be lower case.

line_length.description:
Detects lines exceeding the provided maximum length.
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#stick-to-a-reasonable-line-length
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/04/

local_class_naming.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for local class names.

local_testclass_location.description: Chceks that local test classes are placed in the test include.

local_variable_names.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for local variables, constants and field symbols.

max_one_statement.description:
Chekcks that each line contains only a single statement.
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#no-more-than-one-statement-per-line
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/11/

message_exists.description: In message statements, check that the message class + id exist

method_parameter_names.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for method parameter names

mix_returning.description:
Checks that methods don't have a mixture of returning and exporting/changing parameters
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#use-either-returning-or-exporting-or-changing-but-not-a-combination

msag_consistency.description: Checks the validity of messages in message classes

nesting.description:
Checks for methods exceeding a maximum nesting depth
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#keep-the-nesting-depth-low
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/74/

newline_between_methods.description: Checks for newlines between method implementations.

no_public_attributes.description:
Checks that classes and interfaces don't contain any public attributes.
Exceptions are excluded from this rule.

object_naming.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for object names

obsolete_statement.description: Checks for usages of certain obsolete statements

parser_error.description: Checks for syntax unrecognized by abaplint

prefix_is_current_class.description:
Reports errors if the current class references itself with "current_class=>"
https://github.com/SAP/styleguides/blob/master/clean-abap/CleanABAP.md#omit-the-self-reference-me-when-calling-an-instance-method

release_idoc.description: Checks idoc types and segments are set to status released

remove_descriptions.description: Ensures you have no descriptions in metadata of methods, parameters, etc. For class descriptions, see rule description_empty.

rfc_error_handling.description: Checks that exceptions 'system_failure' and 'communication_failure' are handled in RFC calls

selection_screen_naming.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern, such as a prefix, for selection-screen variable names.

sequential_blank.description: Checks that code does not contain more than the configured number of blank lines in a row.

short_case.description: Checks for CASE statements which have fewer than the specified number of branches

sicf_consistency.description: Checks the validity of ICF services

space_before_colon.description:
Checks that there are no spaces in front of colons in chained statements.
https://docs.abapopenchecks.org/checks/80/

space_before_dot.description: Checks for extra spaces before dots at the ends of statements .

start_at_tab.description: Checks that statements start at tabstops.

superclass_final.description: Checks that classes which are inherited from are not declared as FINAL.

tabl_enhancement_category.description: Checks that tables do not have the enhancement category 'not classified'

type_begin_single_include.description: Finds TYPE BEGIN with just one INCLUDE TYPE

types_naming.description: Allows you to enforce a pattern for TYPES definitions

use_new.description: Checks for deprecated CREATE OBJECT statements.

when_others_last.description: Checks that WHEN OTHERS is placed the last within a CASE statement.

whitespace_end.description: Checks for redundant whitespace at the end of each line.

xml_consistency.description: Checks the consistency of main XML files, eg. naming

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced

NewlineBetweenMethodsConf.description: Checks for newlines between method implementations.

count.description: Amount of newlines, works in conjunction with "newlineLogic"

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

logic.description:
Exact: the exact number of required newlines between methods is defined by "newlineAmount"

Less: the required number of newlines has to be less than "newlineAmount"

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced
